ygData.subject: Re: Fatigue Question
ygData.msgSnippet: with magic items my sta is 95, and I occasionally run out durring a big fight with 3 or more mobs.  I ve actually been in fights where the wiz will run outta
ygData.messageBody:
with magic items my sta is 95, and I occasionally run out durring a big fight with 3 or more mobs. I've actually been in fights where the wiz will run outta mana, meditate up to about half then start blasting again, so timewise I guess that'd be around 3 or 4 minutes, never really timed it tho

>>> David Rogers <derogers334@...> 5.26.99 11:28:14 AM >>>
From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>

--- Jason Coan <COANJ@...> wrote:
> What level are you? As you go up on levels, your
> fights become longer and longer.

Ah, that could be it; my Dwarf's only 16th right now.
How long are we talking about?

Still, STA 95 is +20 over average (75).

===
